summary: Page3Page.tsx was significantly expanded: it now includes a non-generic SEO title/description with canonical "/page-3" and begins a redesigned layout with a styled hero section. However, due to truncation, the diff summary does not provide sufficient evidence that all required sections (grid, detailed bullets/steps, final CTA) and the required navigation CTAs to "/partner-onboarding" and "/contact" are actually present/linked as specified across the full page.

missing_requirements.requirement: Redesign `/page-3` to fully replace placeholder with a production-ready layout matching Page 2 structure (hero, multi-card/grid, detailed bullets/steps, final CTA), responsive, using Tailwind + shadcn/ui consistently.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a new SEO block and the start of a hero section plus data arrays for card-like sections, but the file is truncated before demonstrating the required multi-card/grid section, detailed bullets/steps section, and final CTA section, as well as confirmation that all placeholder content is removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add prominent navigation CTAs on Page 3 routing to existing flows (at minimum `/partner-onboarding` and `/contact`) using TanStack Router `<Link>` and shadcn `<Button>` patterns consistent with Page 2.
missing_requirements.reason: `Link` and `Button` are imported, but the truncated diff does not show actual CTA elements that navigate to `/partner-onboarding` and `/contact`, nor confirm use of the Page 2 button/link pattern.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply a coherent visual theme for Page 3 consistent with existing styling (typography/spacing/section backgrounds) without global theme changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The hero section shows a gradient background and responsive padding, but the remainder of the page (other sectionsâ€™ spacing/typography/background treatments) is not visible in the truncated diff, so consistent theming across sections cannot be verified.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository meta/state tracking files (project_state.json) unrelated to the requested UI/SEO changes for Page 3.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements are limited to Page 3 layout/SEO/CTAs/theme; no requirement mentions updating project state metadata.
BuildRequest does not request changes to documentation/summaries; only Page 3 implementation details were requested.
